pages.text: When making Source Steel, you must inject your iron with source.
To begin this process, combine an iron ingot with Mythical Clay on your glyph press.
Once you have Primed Iron, use your Enchanting Apparatus to further refine your material.
Once you've created your source steel, utilize your enchanting apparatus to plate your Archmage Robes. (Note, not enchantment safe.)
Source Steel armor provides you further improved defenses at the cost of some mana capacity.
